<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Squid](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=155)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 254 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Giant Squid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=820) (Creature 9), [Vampire Squid](/Monsters.aspx?ID=819) (Creature 0)
